title: 皐月賞の後に・次は絶対！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: First place, Mihono Bourbon—!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah...!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon is amazing as expected!
She might really be able to aim for the Triple Crown!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: That was the best, Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: —Mission complete.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The next target is the 'Japanese Derby'.
Executing the plan.
(Whoa...!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
(Amazing...
It's like flowers bloomed all over the spectator stands!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...As expected, Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whew, I couldn't shake her off!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I thought I gave it my all,
but it just wasn't enough.
Indeed, this 'Satsuki Sho' was completely dominated by Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
As expected of the Classic Triple Crown route...
The rivals are all formidable, hmm...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Well, but it's from here on out, right? I missed the Triple Crown,
but it's not over yet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I got to race close to Bourbon-san,
and I kind of figured out her quirks.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So... it's fine!
There's a chance to win the 'Japanese Derby'!
And then—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't reach...
With the current Rice, not at all...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...If things stay like this, nothing will change.
By the 'Japanese Derby',
I need to get stronger, much, much more...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...I have to do my best...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Rice-san... That was a determined gaze.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Come to think of it, today's 'Satsuki Sho'... Bourbon-san was amazing, but Rice-san also had this—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: A unique kind of awesomeness, you could say...! Like, whoa~, yeah~... something like that!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The 'Japanese Derby' and 'Kikuka Sho' will probably be even more intense.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I can't let my guard down even more. Alright, let's do our best~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, Trainer! Let's go eat ramen!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because I'm hungry!
After that, while slurping salt ramen at a random ramen shop we found—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! Extra noodles, please!
We renewed our fighting spirit for the upcoming 'Japanese Derby'!
